about.heading: About the Conference
about.body: The International Conference on Machine Intelligence and Signal Processing (MISP 2021) will be held at National Institute of Technology, Arunachal Pradesh, India, during September 23-25, 2021. This conference is meant for researchers all over the globe interested in the areas of data mining, artificial intelligence, optimization, machine learning methods/ algorithms, signal processing theory and methods, and applications to human brain disorders like epilepsy, Alzheimer’s, sleep disorders etc. Other applications of machine learning and signal processing techniques are also welcome

about.heading: About Uttar Pradesh
about.body: Uttar Pradesh, located in northern India, is a state known for its rich historical, cultural, and natural heritage. With a population of over 200 million people, it is the most populous state in India. Uttar Pradesh boasts a fascinating blend of ancient traditions and modern development.The state is home to several iconic landmarks, such as the majestic Taj Mahal in Agra, which stands as a symbol of love and architectural brilliance. Additionally, the holy city of Varanasi, situated on the banks of the sacred River Ganges, attracts millions of pilgrims and tourists every year.

about.heading: About the MNNIT
about.body: The International Conference on Machine Intelligence and Signal Processing (MISP 2021) will be held at National Institute of Technology, Arunachal Pradesh, India, during September 23-25, 2021. This conference is meant for researchers all over the globe interested in the areas of data mining, artificial intelligence, optimization, machine learning methods/ algorithms, signal processing theory and methods, and applications to human brain disorders like epilepsy, Alzheimer’s, sleep disorders etc. Other applications of machine learning and signal processing techniques are also welcome

publications.head: Publication
publications.content:
PUBLICATION

In the last conferences MISP 2017 (IIT Indore) and MISP 2019 (IIIT Allahabad), all accepted papers have been published in the Conference Proceeding as Springer AISC book series (https://www.springer.com/series/11156) in Springer. This year the Conference Proceeding will be published in Lecture Notes in Electrical Engineering (https://www.springer.com/ series/7818). (Indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus databases). Authors are requested to submit their Manuscripts through the Easy Chair System. The paper must be maximum upto 12 pages.

Click on the following links to submit the Manuscripts and read the guidelines.


Springer Author's Guidelines
EasyChair Submission

Paper Template


Selected and extended versions of research papers will be forwarded for publication as a Special Issue in Scopus and SCI/SCIE indexed Journals of repute.

Special Issue

1: "Data-Driven Approach for Bio-medical and Healthcare" for International Journal of Business Intelligence and Data Mining (Scopus Indexed) (Last date: 30 Nov 2021)


2: Computers Materials & Continua (SCI Indexed, IF=4.89, open-access) Special Issue on "Advanced signal acquisition and processing for Internet of Medical Things" (Last date: 30 June 2021)


3: "Machine Learning and Computational Intelligence for Green Computing" to Journal of Smart Environments and Green Computing (JSEGC). (peer-reviewed, open-access) (No Publication Fees) fromat in above method
